languages.text: "В ноосферных останках разумов техножрецов, что посмели обратиться к нему, были обнаружены обрывки предписаний Процедуры 0-Х. И они были полны гнева".

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."
languages.original_text: "В ноосферных останках разумов техножрецов, что посмели обратиться к нему, были обнаружены обрывки предписаний Процедуры 0-Х. И они были полны гнева".

traits.locale_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-Х, and these traces were brimming with anger."

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-Х, and these traces were brimming with anger."

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-Х. These traces were brimming with anger."

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

"We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

languages.text: “我们研究了那些胆敢接触虚无哈里发的技术神甫的通感遗骸。他们的思维中包含了0-C程序的指令，而那些残留的痕迹充斥着愤怒。”
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

traits.locale_text: “我们研究了那些胆敢接触虚无哈里发的技术神甫的通感遗骸。他们的思维中包含了0-C程序的指令，而那些残留的痕迹充斥着愤怒。”

languages.text: «Hemos estudiado los restos noosféricos de los tecnosacerdotes que se atrevieron a acercarse a Null Caliph. Sus mentes contenían fragmentos de los dictados del Procedimiento 0-C. Estos rastros rezumaban ira».
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos estudiado los restos noosféricos de los tecnosacerdotes que se atrevieron a acercarse a Null Caliph. Sus mentes contenían fragmentos de los dictados del Procedimiento 0-Х. Estos rastros rezumaban ira».

languages.text: 「我々は、大胆にもヌル・カリフに接触を試みた技術司祭のヌースフィアでの遺体を調査しました。彼らの頭の中には、プロシージャー0-Cの指示の抜粋が含まれ、その痕跡は怒りに満ちていました」
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は、大胆にもヌル・カリフに接触を試みた技術司祭のヌースフィアでの遺体を調査しました。彼らの頭の中には、プロシージャー0-Xの指示の抜粋が含まれ、その痕跡は怒りに満ちていました」

languages.text: « Nous avons examiné les restes noosphériques des technoprêtres ayant osé entrer en contact avec Null Caliph. Leurs esprits contenaient des fragments de la Procédure 0-C, des traces où couvait une colère sourde. »
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons examiné les restes noosphériques des technoprêtres ayant osé entrer en contact avec Null Caliph. Leurs esprits contenaient des fragments de la Procédure 0-Х, des traces où couvait une colère sourde. »

languages.text: "Wir haben die noosphärischen Überreste der Techpriester studiert, die es gewagt haben, Null Caliph zu kontaktieren. Ihr Verstand enthielt Auszüge aus den Diktaten von Prozedur 0-C. Diese Rückstände bebten vor Zorn."
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben die noosphärischen Überreste der Techpriester studiert, die es gewagt haben, Null Caliph zu kontaktieren. Ihr Verstand enthielt Auszüge aus dne Diktaten von Prozedur 0-X. Diese Rückstände bebten vor Zorn."

languages.text: "Hiçlik Halifesi'ne ulaşmaya cüret eden Tekno Rahiplerin Noosferik kalıntılarını inceledik. Zihinlerinde 0-C Sayılı Prosedür'den kimi buyrukların kalıntıları bulundu. Bu izler öfkeyle doluydu."
languages.original_text: "We have studied the Noospheric remains of the Tech-Priests who dared to reach out to Null Caliph. Their minds contained excerpts from the dictates of Procedure 0-C. These traces were brimming with anger."
